text: melum, evarkal allahvin mitum avanutaiya tutarkal mitum nampikkai kolkirarkalo, avarkal tam tankal iraivan mun unmaiyalarkalakavum, uyir tiyakikalakavum irupparkal, avarkalukku avarkalutaiya narkuliyum, (nervali kattum) poroliyum untu, evarkal nirakarittuk kontum, nam vacanankalaip poyyakkik kontum irukkirarkalo avarkal naraka vacikaltan
